ValidationRule.description: Score must be a whole number from 0-10
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=0, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=1, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=2, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=3, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=4, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=5, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=6, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=7, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=8, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=9, Impression_of_Project_Score__c!=10 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scores must be a whole number between 0 and 10.
